text: Koi bhi bojh uthaney wala doosray ka bojh nahi uthaye ga agar koi giran baar doosray ko apna bojh uthaney kay liye bulaye ga to woh uss mein say kuch bhi na uthaye ga go qarabat daar hi ho. Tu sirf unhi ko aagah ker sakta hai jo ghaeebana tor per apnay rab say dartay hain aur namazon ki pabandi kertay hain aur jo bhi pak hojaye woh apnay hi nafay kay liye pak hoga. Lotna Allah hi ki taraf hai
